```{r}
mtcars
```

```{r}
model <-'
mpg ~ hp + gear + cyl + disp + carb + am + wt
hp ~ cyl + disp + carb
'
```

```{r}
fit <- cfa(model, data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
summary(fit, fit.measures = TRUE, standardized=T,rsquare=T)
```

```{r}
sem <- sem(model, data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
summary(sem, fit.measures = TRUE, standardized=T,rsquare=T)
```
